Name: Kitty Ball
About the game: Take control of a cat and invite your friends to participate in this amazing multiplayer match where you will have to be the fastest and smartest to unwind your ball of yarn first! Don't let the others outrun you because only one of you will have the chance to lift the Gold Cup üò∫üèÜ üß∂ Unwind your ball üß∂ Every cat has its own color and ball of yarn. Don't lose sight of it and be the fastest to unwind it. Don't let the other players get ahead of you! üí• Slow down your opponents üí• In addition to unrolling your ball, you can also use it to slow down your opponents. Throw your ball at other cats to knock them out before they finish! üêÅ Avoid the traps üêÅ You and your friends aren't alone... You'll have to deal with a tough opponent. He is not afraid, neither of you nor of your ball, his only goal: to crunch you! To slow down your progress Hector the bulldog is never far away. Also be careful not to get distracted by the mice in the house... üïπÔ∏è On computer and smartphone üïπÔ∏è You can join your friends, all your friends! And that's whether they're playing on their computer or their smartphone. And if you don't have any friends, we've got you covered, don't worry. üèÜ Challenge your friends üèÜ Create your own custom game to challenge up to 4 of your friends! Each game is unique, get ready to have to fight to be the first. You can also join a game with players from around the world.
